title: Acupuncture | Holistic Medicine | Full Circle Healing Arts | Annapolis
description: Full Circle Healing Arts is a trusted holistic medical practice located in Annapolis, MD. Opened by Acupuncturists, Dr. Peter Marinakis and Clemency Knox, in 1994, Full Circle offers a wide range of services from Acupuncture, to Herbal Medicine, Facial Rejuvenation, to Energy Healing, and more.
cleaned_text: top of page FULL CIRCLE HEALING ARTS Integrative Medicine for Body, Mind, Spirit About Us Since 1994, Full Circle has offered natural healing services designed to rejuvenate the body, mind, and soul. We recognize health as a journey, and the services we offer are here to support you on every level - whether you have an acute or chronic condition or just a desire to nurture your emotional and spiritual well-being. Every person carries the power to heal within... begin your journey with us! Contact Us 20 Ridgely Avenue, Suite 302, Annapolis, MD 21401 (410) 266 - 9370 Fax (410) 266 - 3902 bottom of page
